comment.author: 80878055@N00
comment._content:
Tullyelmer Steam Laundry, in Tullyelmer townland on the northern outskirts of Armagh City. Also know as Armagh City Steam Laundry. 

The laundry operated in these old mill premises from 1907 to June 1951

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: Thanks NIreland eye, the caption has now been changed.

comment._content: This photo was used in an advert in the Armagh Guardian from 3 May to 14 June 1912
